rules_text:
Break
When Noah, Ouroboros Off-Seer attacks, another target legendary creature and Noah each gain indestructible until end of turn.
When creatures you both own and control named Noah, Ouroboros Off-Seer and Mio, Ouroboros Zephyr attack, once per game, you may exile them, then meld them into Noah’s Ouroboros. It enters tapped and attacking.
